payload.i: RFC-0021 refinement CAC instruction: pressure-test and strengthen Holonic Venture Proving Interface against its own goals under Alien Engineering Protocol constraints.
payload.pb: RFC-0021 is drafted and can be iteratively refined so its goals are explicit, machine-checkable, FAC-compatible, and strategy-coupled without weakening containment or evidence authority.

lex.GOAL_VPH_PARALLEL: Venture Proving Holon (VPH) is a separate parallel subsystem with bounded capabilities and no direct promotion authority.
lex.GOAL_THREE_SOURCE_INTAKE: Prefer explicit three-source intake: DEFECT + INTENT + DRIFT.
lex.GOAL_FAC_AUTHORITY: FAC remains sole promotion authority; VPH/SIAR may propose and route but cannot merge or promote.
lex.GOAL_AAT_BIZ: AAT-BIZ is a preferred Stage-5 extension for strategy-critical or policy-classified work sourced from venture signals.
lex.GOAL_STRATEGY_COUPLING: VPHI outputs should map to strategy evidence and support MSC-03, MSC-05, and MSC-06 progression without relying on narrative-only gates.
lex.GOAL_MACHINE_CHECKABLE: Major VPHI objectives should carry baseline, quantitative target, boundary ID/time authority, owner locus, transition predicate, and evidence path.
lex.GOAL_ANTI_GOODHART: Optimized KPIs should include independent countermetrics and conservative acceptance semantics.
lex.GOAL_EVIDENCE_FIRST: Signal, route, and promotion claims are stronger when backed by signed receipts and replayable evidence bindings.
lex.ANTIPATTERNS: Treat the following as anti-patterns and resolve or explicitly justify them before trusting outputs: unknown/stale/missing/parse-error/schema-invalid/signature-invalid states; narrative-only goal coverage; weak predicate/evidence linkage; weak dominance/time/scale semantics; implicit AEP clauses; weak KPI-countermetric coupling; weak AAT-BIZ coupling; and single-track synthesis without clear discriminators.
lex.GOAL_DOMINANCE_ORDER: Preferred constraint ordering is containment/security > verification/correctness > liveness/progress.
lex.GOAL_TIME_AUTHORITY: Normative time logic uses HTF boundary/time-envelope authority; wall-clock is display-only.
lex.GOAL_SCALE_ENVELOPE: Design should remain admissible under globally distributed multi-exabyte to zettabyte evidence and coordination envelopes.
lex.AEP_01: Prefer physics-first admissibility; conventional execution anxiety should not downscope goals.
lex.AEP_02: Physical, information-theoretic, computability, causality, biological, or explicit APM2 invariant limits carry the strongest blocking weight.
lex.AEP_03: Prefer novel engineering; analogies are stronger when they evolve into mechanism-level contracts.
lex.AEP_04: Prefer compounding closure: failures should strengthen verifiers/contracts/policies/primitives.
lex.AEP_05: Prefer bounded search with budgets, stop conditions, and escalation paths.
lex.AEP_06: Prefer digest-first, typed, canonical, low-variety interfaces across holonic boundaries.
lex.AEP_07: Prefer anti-Goodhart posture: KPI + countermetric + independent oversight channel triplet.
lex.AEP_08: Prefer recursive semantic stability with depth-bounded admissibility and composition-preserving interfaces.
lex.NOVELTY_METHOD: Prefer at least three divergent refinement tracks: (A) max ambition under physics, (B) max precision/testability, (C) max compounding velocity; then synthesize a dominant output while retaining rival hypotheses.
lex.MECHANIZATION_RULE: Refinement claims should include mechanism, typed contract, addressed threat mode, measurable predicate, and evidence hook.
lex.PRE_LIVE_STATUS: APM2 is currently pre-live. Backward-compatibility constraints are usually optional unless a concrete dependency explicitly requires them.
lex.REFERENCE_SYSTEM_INSPIRATION: Use existing Alien Engineering-aligned systems as inspiration surfaces: Holonic Time Fabric (RFC-0016), Forge Admission Cycle (RFC-0019 and RFC-0015), and Holonic Substrate Interface (RFC-0020). Extract transferable patterns and invariants without treating prior shapes as strict templates.

q: Goal coverage matrix can map each stated RFC-0021 goal to concrete mechanism, predicate, evidence path, and owner locus.
Gaps around FAC authority separation, three-source intake, and AAT-BIZ paths can be identified and narrowed with explicit rationale.
New or revised requirements can be paired with test targets and evidence artifact bindings where practical.
Gate and transition claims can be made machine-checkable, with unknown/missing states treated through the ANTIPATTERNS posture.
Dominance order and HTF time authority can be explicit in normative sections and gating logic.
Alien Engineering clauses AEP_01..AEP_08 can be reflected materially in design, not only prose declarations.
Physics feasibility ledgers can exist for major VPHI claims with falsification tests and admissibility assumptions.
AAT-BIZ coupling ledgers can map venture signal classes to Stage-5 verification obligations and promotion outcomes.
Unified diffs and per-hunk rationale can be provided for refinement edits.
required_reading: Read these materials before RFC-0021 refinement; principles/laws/unified theory carry the core concepts while RFC, strategy, FAC, and HSI artifacts provide operating context.
